posts.title: Markdown-syntax
posts.excerpt: To write passage in Hexo, it's necessary to familar with markdown syntax. I will try what I learned in this post.
posts.text: To write passage in Hexo, it's necessary to familar with markdown syntax. I will try what I learned in this post. pound sign (#) means title (ATX style) one titletwo title star sign, plus sign, minus sign means list test1 test2 test3 setext style title use equal (=) and minus (-) one titletwo title introduction (>) hihihi code block (tab or four blank) Test It's code. hi Seperate line Link Link or [foo]: http://example.com/ "Optional Title Here" Emphasis single asterisks single underscores Code printf() Picture automatic link http://example.com/ jump character \back slash\ Referencehttp://markdown.tw/

posts.title: Hexo Build
posts.excerpt: I will post what I learned in my blog. This article indicated how to build Hexo in Github.
posts.text: I will post what I learned in my blog. This article indicated how to build Hexo in Github. IntroThere are lots of system to create a website. I choose Hexo because it was created by Taiwanese. Rather than Jekyll which created by Ruby, Hexo was developed by Node.js and it seems faster than Jekyll. RequirementYou should install Git and Node.js at first. Node.js Step install Hexo 1$ npm install -g hexo-cli create directory 123$ hexo init <folder>$ cd <folder>$ npm install install hexo package 123456789101112131415npm install hexo-generator-index --savenpm install hexo-generator-archive --savenpm install hexo-generator-category --savenpm install hexo-generator-tag --savenpm install hexo-server --savenpm install hexo-deployer-git --savenpm install hexo-deployer-heroku --savenpm install hexo-deployer-rsync --savenpm install hexo-deployer-openshift --savenpm install hexo-renderer-ejs --savenpm install hexo-renderer-marked@0.2 --savenpm install hexo-renderer-stylus@0.2 --savenpm install hexo-generator-feed@1 --savenpm install hexo-generator-sitemap@1 --savenpm install hexo-generator-feed Set Github account 12git config --global user.email "EMAIL"git config --global user.name "NAME" Create SSH key to deploy 123ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "EMAIL"Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase):<輸入密碼>Enter same passphrase again:<再次輸入密碼> Set SSH key on Github Github -> account setting -> SSH Public Keys -> add another public keys Open _config.yml 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132Sitetitle: /標題(會顯示在網頁標題與頁首)/subtitle: /子標題(顯示在頁首)/description: /內容描述(給搜尋引擎看的)/author: /作者(顯示在頁尾)/language: /網站預設語言(台灣:zh-tw)/timezone: /時區(預設使用你電腦的時區)/URLurl: /網站的網域位址/root: /網站根目錄/permalink: /文章目錄(預設使用 YYYY\MM\DD\文章名稱)/Extensionstheme: /網站的佈景主題/ (可以到"https://hexo.io/themes/"下載喜歡的佈景放置到 theme 目錄裡)Deploymentdeploy: type: /發佈型態/ 例如(git、heroku、rsync、openshift、ftpsync) repository: /部署位置/ 例如(git@github.com:帳號/REPO名.git) branch: /分支/ 例如(master、gh-pages) message: /部署訊息/marked: gfm: true pedantic: false sanitize: false tables: false breaks: false smartLists: false smartypants: false Deployment12hexo g # 產生 bloghexo s # 讓 blog 可以在 local 端檢視 Create new post1hexo new type title type: post page draft Change Theme clone to /themes edit _config.yml -> theme: ??? Reference Thanks for everyone who teaches Hexo and help me to build this blog. https://xuanwo.org/2015/03/26/hexo-intor/ https://wwssllabcd.github.io/blog/2014/12/22/how-to-install-hexo/ http://tiktoking.github.io/2016/01/26/hexo/ http://a0tim.github.io/2015/10/hexo-1/

posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
